channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Team Foundation Server Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Team Foundation Server Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21637|2024-08-03T18:16:23.782Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20foundation%20server%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Team Foundation Server Plugin 5.157.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2021-21636|2024-08-03T18:16:23.823Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20foundation%20server%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Team Foundation Server Plugin 5.157.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials ID of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2021-21638|2024-08-03T18:16:23.814Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20foundation%20server%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Team Foundation Server Plugin 5.157.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
